description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)For Task–Based Informatics Professional Service: Requirements for services (TBIPS)GSIN: D302A – Informatics Professional servicesReference Number:9F019Solicitation Number:9F019-22-0115Organization Name:Canadian space Agency (CSA)Solicitation Date : January, 06th 2023Closing Time: February 1st 2023 at 2h00 PM (EST)Amendement #1 - February 8th 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)Estimate Level of Effort: Indicate in the Statement of work (SOW)Contract Duration:From one year after the award date of the contractSolicitation Method:CompetitiveComprehensive Land Claim Agreement Applies:NoApplicable Trade Agreements:The requirement is subject to the provisions of CFTARequirement DetailsTendering Procedure: Selective TenderingThis requirement is only open to the following pre-qualified suppliers under the Task Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TBIPS), # EN578-170432/B for the following categories:Resource category: Tier 1 Requirements: Greater than NAFTA to $3.75 MillionStream 1: (A) Application ServicesCategory A.7 - Programmer/AnalystLevel: (1) resource level SeniorSupplier Security Clearance: DOS – ReliabilityDocument Safeguarding: NoneRegion/Metropolitan: Montréal Area – Virtual modeAll companies listed in attached file are the only ones eligible to participate in this process. If your company is not listed, do not ask the contracting authority to add you.Description of Work:Canadian Space Agency is seeking to provide one resource for a four (4) or a five (5) days-a-week on principally virtual mode but with a possibility of prudential at Canadian Space Agency’s office at 6767 rte de l’Aéroport St-Hubert, QC. Presence online or in place must be between 7:00H AM to 6:00H PM for a Programmer Analyst.
